extension.title: Subforums
extension.description: Add multilevel subforums. See options in Administration → Settings → Features.
extension.author: Sergey "putnik" Leschina

hooks.hook: // Load subforums class require_once $ext_info['path'] . '/subforums.class.php';
// Hide subforums $query['WHERE'] = '(' . $query['WHERE'] . ') AND f.parent_id = 0';
// Generate subforums hierarchy $subforums->add_crumbs($cur_topic['forum_id']);
// Generate subforums hierarchy $subforums->add_crumbs($cur_posting['id']);
// Generate subforums hierarchy $subforums->add_crumbs($cur_post['fid']);
$query['WHERE'] = '(' . $query['WHERE'] . ') AND f.parent_id = 0';
// Get info about parent $query['SELECT'] .= ', f.parent_id';
$query['INSERT'] .= ', parent_id'; $query['VALUES'] .= ', ' . $subforums_parent_id;
$form['show_subforums_list'] = isset($_POST['form']['show_subforums_list']) ? intval($_POST['form']['show_subforums_list']) : 0;
// Add mode selection ?>
$query['INSERT'] .= ', show_subforums_list'; $query['VALUES'] .= ', ' . $forum_config['o_subforums_show_list'];
$query['WHERE'] = 't.forum_id IN (' . implode(', ', $subforums->get_tree()) . ')';
$query['WHERE'] = 't.forum_id IN (' . implode(', ', $subforums->get_tree()) . ') AND t.moved_to is NULL';
